name: breakpoint(receiveSubscription:receiveOutput:receiveCompletion:)
desc: Raises a debugger signal when a provided closure needs to stop the process in the debugger.
declaration: func breakpoint(receiveSubscription: ((Subscription) -> Bool)? = nil, receiveOutput: ((Self.Output) -> Bool)? = nil, receiveCompletion: ((Subscribers.Completion<Self.Failure>) -> Bool)? = nil) -> Publishers.Breakpoint<Self>
